org.intermine.neo4j.metadata

Class Neo4jSchemaGenerator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.intermine.neo4j.metadata.Neo4jSchemaGenerator

  • public class Neo4jSchemaGenerator
extends java.lang.Object
    Generates schema/metagraph of a given Neo4j graph database and stores it inside the database itself. All nodes of the metagraph are assigned a "Metagraph" label. Metagraph structure described at https://gist.github.com/yasharmaster/8071e53c500081660b9e5c203b913b6d
    Author:
    Yash Sharma

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Neo4jSchemaGenerator() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void destroySchema(org.neo4j.driver.v1.Driver driver)
      Deletes the mmetagraph from the database.
      static void generateSchema(org.neo4j.driver.v1.Driver driver)
      Creates a Metagraph which maps all the nodes and relationships of the database.
      static Model getModel(org.neo4j.driver.v1.Driver driver)
      Creates and returns a Model object from the metagraph
      static boolean schemaExists(org.neo4j.driver.v1.Driver driver)
      Finds out if schema (metagraph) exists in the Neo4j database.
